version_description: Adjust the scanned barcodes sequence to first in first out.

Add more barcode suffix selection after each scan, select from None, Return, Tab, Comma(,) and Semicolon(;). 
With the Tab suffix, you can jump to next input field automatically after a scan.

New setting options to convert UPC-A to ENA 13 and remove the last check digit. 
Improve the performance for Table Apps, such as Excel, WPS Office.
Add an option to remove the start/end characters(A,B,C,D) of Codabar
New team and enterprise subscription to support MDM or Apple Business Manager deployment.
Add a new setting option to set the Scan Sound (Tone or Vibrate).  You can set it to Vibrate or None to avoid interfering with other apps using the phone speaker.
New enterprise subscription up to 1000 members
Optimize the cloud data sync speed (10x)
